type StoryFragment = class interface IAddChild interface seq<BlockElement> interface IEnumerable

summary.span: Represents all or part of a story within an XPS document.

span.span: Represents all or part of a story within an XPS document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 XPS 情景[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文档是大致类似于报纸或杂志中的文章。An XPS story in an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document is roughly analogous to a story in a newspaper or magazine. 它是一段文本和图形的内容，通常在单个主题，在单个上[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文档。It is a passage of text and graphic content, usually on a single topic, within a single [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document. 通常情况下，该视图所跨越多个页，但它可以是短于如下侧栏的页-装箱的情景-杂志中。Typically, it spans multiple pages, but it can be shorter than a page like a sidebar — boxed story — in a magazine. 一篇文章也可以像在第 4 页继续前页报纸文章不连续。A story can also be discontinuous like a front page newspaper story that is continued on page 4. 因此，给定的页可以有多个情景和多个情景的部分。Consequently, a given page can have more than one story and parts of more than one story. 页眉或页脚也是情景的一种特殊的完全包含在一页。A header or footer is also a special kind of story that is entirely contained on a single page. A表示所有或情景的一部分。A represents all or a portion of a story. 它不能跨多个页上，但它可以占用整个页面或与其他片段共享页。It can never span more than one page, but it can occupy the whole of a page or share a page with other fragments. 如果一篇文章位于多个页上，它在每个页上的每个部分是一个单独的段落。If a story is on more than one page, each part of it on each page is a separate fragment. 尽管情景可以具有不连续的片段，但没有片段本身也可以是不连续。Although stories can have discontinuous sets of fragments, no fragment can itself be discontinuous. 仅元素可以是父级的。Only a element can be a parent of a . 位置中的元素该值指示如果文章是否包含多个片段中，如果其他片段前面或者按照当前的片段。The location of the elements within a indicates if the story is contained in multiple fragments, and if the additional fragments either precede or follow the current fragment. 当中间某个结构的元素的结束; 说出``，然后[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文档生成应用程序必须将插入相应的结束标记元素 (在这种情况下``) 之前``标记，即使但是，在结构在更高版本的片段中将是正在继续执行。When a ends in the middle of some structural element; say a ``, then [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document-producing applications must insert an appropriate end tag for the element (in this case ``) before the `` tag, even though the structure is being continued in a later fragment. (这是必需确保中的元素树是有效的 XML。)继续该情景的片段必须以开头的中断结构的开始标记。(This is necessary to ensure that the element tree within the is valid XML.) The fragment that continues the story must begin with an opening tag for the interrupted structure. 中断结构的整个树必须被视为相同的方式 （通过一个例外，如下所述）： 必须为每个不匹配的开始标记的中断点上方添加结束标记。The entire tree of interrupted structures must be treated the same way (with one exception, discussed below): End tags must be added for every unmatched start tag above the point of interruption. 异常适用时情景中断后立即出现``标记，则生成的应用程序必须将插入空表单元格结构 (``) 继续该情景的片段中的相应点处。The exception applies when the story interruption comes immediately after a `` tag, then the producing application must insert an empty table cell structure (``) at the corresponding point in the fragment that continues the story. 这是必需的因此，需要合并的给定情景的所有片段的消费应用程序可以使用一个简单的算法执行此操作。This is necessary so that consuming applications that need to merge all fragments of a given story can use a simple algorithm to do this. 例如，假定应用程序想要添加到以下材料[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文档：Assume, for example, that an application wanted to add the following material to an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document: ``` ``` 如果分页符将强制结束转换成片段紧后面``"SomeContent"，为应用程序必须创建拆分，如下面的示例中所示：If a page break forces an end to the fragment just after the `` for "SomeContent", the application must create the split as shown in the following example: ``` ``` 读取文档的应用程序可能需要合并此内容。An application that reads the document might need to merge this content. 例如，考虑使用 XPS 查看器**复制到剪贴板的整篇文章**按钮; 或**供盲人 XPS**传递给语音合成器的情景的应用程序。Consider, for example, an XPS viewer with a **Copy Whole Story to Clipboard** button; or an **XPS for the Blind** application that passed stories to a voice synthesizer. 某些应用程序读取该文档可能需要合并的片段的一篇文章的子集。Some applications that read the document may need to merge a subset of the fragments of a story. 例如，将需要一种功能，将整个段落复制到剪贴板，由三次单击要进行合并，每当段落跨越分页符，因为此类段落将两个之间分割s。For example, a feature that copies a whole paragraph to the clipboard by triple-clicking it would need to do a merge whenever the paragraph spanned a page break, because such a paragraph would be split between two s. **若要合并使用这种算法：****To merge use this algorithm:** 1. 删除``结尾处的第一个片段合并和删除``从第二个开始。Delete the `` from the end of the first fragment to be merged and delete the `` from the beginning of the second. 2. 如果第一个片段的最后一个结束标记属于相同类型作为第一个开始标记的第二个片段 (并不是``标记)，删除这两个。If the last closing tag of the first fragment is of the same type as the first opening tag of the second fragment (and they are not `` tags), delete them both. 3. 重复步骤 2，直到两个片段中*任一*种状态：Repeat step 2 until the two fragments are in *either* of these states: - 不再前导片段尾随片段的第一个开始标记的最后一个结束标记之间的类型匹配。There is no longer a type match between the last end tag of the leading fragment the first start tag of the trailing fragment. - 最后一个的结束标记处前导片段尾随片段的第一个开始标记都是``标记。The last end tag of the leading fragment the first start tag of the trailing fragment are both `` tags. 在上面的示例中，如果有尚未对空单元格添加生成应用程序，然后在合并的片段将生成的表，该表第一行必须首先包含而不是原始"SomeContent"和"MoreContent"引用的一个单元格每个包含的单一引用具有两个单元格的行In the example above, if the empty cell had not been added by the producing application, then a merger of the fragments would produce a table whose first row had only one cell containing both the "SomeContent" and "MoreContent" references instead of the original first row with two cells, each containing a single reference 当合并整篇文章时，应为每个后续片段属于同一篇文章重复算法。When the entire story is being merged, the algorithm should be repeated for each subsequent fragment that is part of the same story. 属于某个情景的片段索引中``元素。The fragments that belong to a story are indexed in the `` element. 请参阅的部分 9.1.15[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]规范可以获取在[XPS： 规范和许可证下载](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。See section 9.1.15 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). 将具有给定情景的最后一个段落作为其最后一个子级的元素。The last fragment for a given story will have a element as its last child. ## Examples 下面的示例演示``属于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]文档。The following example shows the `` part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document. [!code-xaml[DocumentStructure#DocStructStoryFragContent1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DocumentStructure/CSharp/Content/FixedPage1_structure.xaml#docstructstoryfragcontent1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能的值包括"标头，""页脚"和"内容。Possible values include "Header," "Footer," and "Content." 有关详细信息`FragmentType`属性``属于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]文档，请参阅章节 9 的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]规范可以获取在[XPS： 规范和许可证下载](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).For more information about the `FragmentType` attribute of the `` part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document, see chapter 9 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). ## Examples 下面的示例演示`FragmentType`属性``属于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]文档。The following example shows the `FragmentType` attribute of the `` part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document. remarks.format: ## Remarks 给定情景的所有片段必须都具有此属性的相同值。All fragments of a given story must have the same value for this property. 它必须匹配`StoryName`属性``元素。It must match the `StoryName` attribute of the `` element. 请参阅的部分 9.1.15[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]规范可以获取在[XPS： 规范和许可证下载](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。See section 9.1.15 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). 此属性可以是未指定，如果是页眉或页脚。This property can be unspecified if is Header or Footer. ## Examples 下面的示例演示`StoryName`属性``属于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]文档。The following example shows the `StoryName` attribute of the `` part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document.
